duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with the insertion of catheters into the heart and measure and administer special fluids.
Under the general supervision of the Cath Lab Supervisor, assist with diagnostic and therapeutic invasive cardiology patient procedures in the catheterization labs.
Demonstrate knowledge of the principles of radiographic imaging, patient physiologic monitoring, and cardiac arrhythmias recognition.
Participate in the on-call rotation and respond within 30 minutes to the Cath Lab when on call.

education_certification.credential: Successful graduation from accredited Ultrasound or Cardiovascular Technology Program. Or grandfathered in with current Certification from ARDMS (RVT), or ARRT (VS-Vascular Sonography), or CCI (RVS) required. BLS from American Heart Association required upon hire. Certification with ARDMS (RVT) or ARRT (VS-Vascular Sonography), or CCI (RVS) recommended upon hire and required within 18 months of hire.
